title: I Found A Random Icon
body: Around yesterday, I changed my icon and noticed an icon that showed two golden hands. Could someone explain what this icon represents and why it was given out for free? Discuss.

replies.body:
Hi Edday,

Congrats! Sounds like you've received the positive player icon reward: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/positive-play-icon-unlocked

Any player that was not banned between 15th June and 15th September has received this icon. Thanks for being a positive player :D

Hi Riot when do others get this icon? :D

Many Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=GCSBBlitzForever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9gyEiZTH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-29T03:24:34.198+0000)
>
> Hi Riot when do others get this icon? :D
> 
> Many Thanks

you should already have it
ah got it thanks :D. Hidden away at the bottom

It's the positive player icon! 

It means you haven't been restricted or banned. More info here :)

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/positive-play-icon-unlocked
Alright thanks for wrapping it up Riot! Thanks for everything you've done for us! I really appreciate it.
